files.name: TheBoss
files.content:
August 10th:
I'm sure everybody has heard something regarding this, but I'm not sure that our boss is.... really what he claims to be....

files.name: TheBossPT2
files.content:
August 21st:
Guys, after the last round of interviews and pictures, I'm almost sure of it now! I don't think Zuckerberg is human! The proof is in the pudding!

files.name: Kevin'sCredentials
files.content:
Kevin's password
12345
I can't believe this is actually his password! It's so inelegant and weak unlike a password like 'beetlover'. He's honestly just a walking security vulnerability! To make matters worse, corporate requires our usernames to just be our names! I'm going to have to log onto his computer and prove just how dangerous he is!

files.name: TheBossIsCalling
files.content:
August 22nd:
The Boss is calling me into his office today... Surely it can't be about my email the other day, could it? I'll have to bring my pepperspray, though I can only hope it's effective... If you're reading this and I'm missing, let this be proof as to what's happened to me.

files.name: contract
files.content: Haha, imagine doing work! Good thing our boss is an idiot.

files.name: promotion
files.content: Work smarter, not harder. With how things are going, it's only a matter of time before I get that sweet, sweet promotion.

files.name: contract
files.content: Haha, imagine doing work! Good thing our boss is an idiot.

files.name: 'Kevin'
files.content:
July 31st:
Oscar,
Why do you bother to put up with sitting by that dullard Kevin?! Have you seen just how thick and slow he is? LMAO. Imagine thinking that 12345 is actually a good password! Haha anyways, you should hurry and switch computers with Zoe so that we can sit close together.
Your good friend,
Angela

files.name: ComputerExchanges
files.content:
August 1st:
Oscar,
Why does Zoe have to such a jerk? Don't worry though, I think we can take advantage of a loophole! The boss usually wanders around his big office just below me, so he's often not at his desk. I'll bet that he has a master list of all the computers and passwords stored on there, so what if you were to get on there and switch some names around? If Zoe's computer has your name, then it must be yours right?
Angela

files.name: July21st
files.content: Angela just won't look my way. What's so good about some stupid farmer? He just plays with plants and wades around in animal excrements all day! Angela, look at me, I'm the one for you! I will dedicate everything to your name! EVERYTHING!

files.name: August23rd
files.content: Angela didn't show up to work today...

files.name: August29th
files.content: Angela still hasn't shown up to work! Apparently she still works here, so what is going on?!

files.name: September1st
files.content: Something is fishy, I need to investigate... I think Angela said the boss has a masterlist of credentials...

files.name: TheMetaverse
files.content: The Metaverse is everything. The Metaverse is everywhere. The Metaverse is now. The Metaverse is the future. Embrace the Metaverse, for the Metaverse is here.

files.name: PasswordConduct
files.content:
Harold,
My employee Zoe appears to have a system password that is quite inappropriate:
babyspanker69
Please take corrective actions.
-Zuckerberg

files.name: UseOfTime
files.content:
Volodymyr,
It's come to my attention that there has been a blatant misuse of company time in which you have been playing some kind of 'farming simulator' game on your mobile device instead of working. While we know that you are very passionate towards your hobbies, while you are on company time, we require that you do your work.
-Zuckerberg

files.name: UnlimitedBeetWorks
files.content: I am the shaft of my hoe. Dirt is my body and water is my blood. I have farmed over a thousand beets. Unaware of loss, nor aware of gain. Withstood pain to farm beets, waiting for each growth. I have no regrets. This is the only path. My whole life was unlimited beets farming.

files.name: PasswordChange
files.content:
Zoe,
It has come to my attention through the boss that your current password violates several clauses of your employee contract. Please change your password by the end of today or we will be forced to take stricter actions.
Harold
